Interface IProjectService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectServiceImpl
public interface IProjectService

  • Method Details

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all Project objects.

    • getVisibleProjectsForApplicant

      List<Project> getVisibleProjectsForApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves projects visible and eligible for a specific applicant based on their profile and project status/dates/visibility.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      List of eligible and visible Project objects.

    • getProjectById

      Project getProjectById(int projectId)
      Retrieves a specific project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      Returns:
      Project object or null if not found.

    • createProject

      Project createProject(String managerNric, String name, String neighborhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> units, Date open, Date close, int slots)
      Creates a new BTO project. Requires manager privileges. Performs checks like manager availability during the period.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - NRIC of the HDB Manager creating the project.
      name - Project name.
      neighborhood - Project location.
      units - Map of FlatType to total unit count.
      open - Application opening date.
      close - Application closing date.
      slots - Maximum number of HDB Officer slots (1-10).
      Returns:
      The created Project object, or null on failure (e.g., validation error, manager conflict).

    • editProject

      boolean editProject(int projectId, Project updatedDetails, String editorNric)
      Edits the details of an existing project. Requires manager privileges (assigned manager).
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project to edit.
      updatedDetails - Project object containing the new details (or pass individual fields). Care must be taken regarding which fields are editable.
      editorNric - NRIC of the manager attempting the edit.
      Returns:
      true if edit successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteProject

      boolean deleteProject(int projectId, String deleterNric)
      Deletes a project. Requires manager privileges (assigned manager). Handles cleanup of related entities (applications, enquiries, etc.) carefully. May be prevented if active bookings exist.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project to delete.
      deleterNric - NRIC of the manager attempting deletion.
      Returns:
      true if deletion successful, false otherwise.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      boolean toggleProjectVisibility(int projectId, boolean isVisible, String managerNric)
      Toggles the visibility of a project for applicants. Requires manager privileges (assigned manager).
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      isVisible - true to make visible, false to hide.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action.
      Returns:
      true if toggle successful, false otherwise.

    • getProjectsManagedBy

      List<Project> getProjectsManagedBy(String managerNric)
      Retrieves all projects managed by a specific HDB Manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager.
      Returns:
      List of Project objects managed by this manager.

    • addOfficerToProject

      boolean addOfficerToProject(int projectId, String officerNric)
      Adds an officer's NRIC to the list of assigned officers for a project. Typically called by HDBManagerService after approving a registration.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer to add.
      Returns:
      true if officer added successfully (and slots available), false otherwise.

    • removeOfficerFromProject

      boolean removeOfficerFromProject(int projectId, String officerNric)
      Removes an officer's NRIC from a project (e.g., if officer resigns/is removed).
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      officerNric - NRIC of the officer to remove.
      Returns:
      true if removal successful.

    • decrementProjectUnit

      boolean decrementProjectUnit(int projectId, FlatType type)
      Decrements the available unit count for a specific flat type in a project. Used during booking.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      type - FlatType being booked.
      Returns:
      true if unit count decremented successfully, false if no units were available.

    • incrementProjectUnit

      boolean incrementProjectUnit(int projectId, FlatType type)
      Increments the available unit count for a specific flat type in a project. Used if a booking is cancelled.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      type - FlatType being returned.
      Returns:
      true if unit count incremented successfully.

    • isProjectWithinApplicationPeriod

      boolean isProjectWithinApplicationPeriod(int projectId, Date date)
      Checks if a given date falls within the application period of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project.
      date - The date to check.
      Returns:
      true if the date is within the application period (inclusive), false otherwise.

    • getHandlingProjectForOfficer

      Project getHandlingProjectForOfficer(String officerNric)
      Retrieves the project an HDB Officer is currently assigned to handle.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - NRIC of the HDB Officer.
      Returns:
      Project object or null if not assigned.
